data.title: Cyn Santana Announces Pregnancy + Sparks Engagement Rumors
data.meta_description: Congratulations are in order!Artist and reality star, Cyn Santana, reveals she's expecting her second baby.
data.text:
Congratulations are in order!

Artist and reality star, Cyn Santana, reveals she’s expecting her second baby. “Life been showing out lately..” she captions a video shared to her Instagram.

“Stunning!! The glow is insane! When you are loved right it beams!! Congratulations..” commented one fan. “I knew you had a different glow I was like she looks different and I think it’s a girl!!!!” commented another.

Santana also shared a series of pictures following the video announcement. “Big mama, big blessed..” she captioned the pictures. Fans happen to noticed what appeared an engagement ring. “Big Mama with the Big Ring..” reacted one fan. “Who’s the lucky man put that giant rock on you!!” questioned another.

Santana shares her first child with rapper and podcaster, Joe Budden. The two were engaged for four month and ended their relationship 2019. They were together for about three years.

Reflecting on their breakup in a previous interview, Santana says the split was for the betterment of her mental health.

“I did what was best for my mental health, my peace and for me and my son … It was a decision that I had to make on my own. This wasn’t a unison thing … Let’s just say that I’m probably the happiest I’ve ever been and that was probably the best decision that I’ve made in my entire life. In the 26 years I have of living on this earth, the best decision I made was leaving that relationship. And my son and I are amazing.”
